author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: Expert panel to assess face mask use by public
description: Experts are set to assess the value of face masks in helping slow the spread of coronavirus.
content:
Image copyrightReuters
Should more of us wear face masks to help slow the spread of coronavirus?
This question is to be assessed by a panel of advisers to the World Health Organization (WHO).
The group will weigh up research on whether the virus can be pro… [+5272 chars]
